name: UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode
desc: Constants that describe the display modes of the Back button.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The navigation item attempts to display a specific title, a generic title, or no title for the Back button, depending on the space available.

items.name: case generic
items.desc: The navigation item attempts to display a generic title or no title for the Back button, depending on the space available.

items.name: case minimal
items.desc: The navigation item displays the Back button indicator instead of a title.
